job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of AI capabilities into a customer support system, which falls under the broader umbrella of software development and integration to enhance existing systems.

job_tasks.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of using human expertise to identify shortcomings in AI and then actively improving the AI system, which aligns with model improvement and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions and providing feedback on AI-generated solutions, which is a core aspect of model development and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies, even if AI-related, is a software development task focused on integration and evaluation.

soft_skills.phrase: we will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the expectation for rapid learning and adaptation to new products within a short timeframe.

soft_skills.phrase: if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, indicating that individuals must be able to overcome obstacles independently.

profile.rationale: The role focuses on integrating AI capabilities into customer support systems and improving existing AI systems through feedback and fine-tuning. While there's an element of AI improvement (1.B.1), the primary emphasis is on integrating these AI aspects into a broader support function and prototyping new AI tools (1.A.1). The role is not about building AI models from scratch or specializing deeply in GenAI techniques but rather using and enhancing AI to support existing operations. Therefore, it fits the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a customer support context. The tasks are specific enough to categorize, although the 'AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions' could be interpreted in multiple ways. The emphasis on improving the AI system and fine-tuning sessions leans towards AI specialization, but the core function remains support, making it AI-adjacent.
